content.question: An object hangs in equilibrium from a spring, as shown above. The object is then displaced to one of the labeled points <math alttext="uppercase X" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>X</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>, <math alttext="Y" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>Y</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>, or <math alttext="Z" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>Z</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> . Which of the following correctly ranks the elastic potential energy <math alttext="U" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>U</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> stored in the spring when the object is at each of the three positions?

choices.label: <math alttext="U sub Z is greater than, open parenthesis, U sub uppercase X, which equals U sub Y, close parenthesis" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>U</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>Z</mi></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mrow><mi>U</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>X</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mrow><mi>U</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>Y</mi></mrow></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="U sub Y is greater than, open parenthesis, U sub uppercase X, which equals U sub Z, close parenthesis" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>U</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>Y</mi></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mrow><mi>U</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>X</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mrow><mi>U</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>Z</mi></mrow></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="U sub Y, is greater than U sub uppercase X, which is greater than U sub Z" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>U</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>Y</mi></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mrow><mi>U</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>X</mi></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mrow><mi>U</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>Z</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="U sub Y, is greater than U sub Z, which is greater than U sub uppercase X" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>U</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>Y</mi></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mrow><mi>U</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>Z</mi></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mrow><mi>U</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>X</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="U sub Y, is greater than U sub uppercase X, which is greater than U sub Z" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>U</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>Y</mi></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mrow><mi>U</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>X</mi></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mrow><mi>U</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>Z</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
